name: Magic Monsters
description:
Discover the wonderful world of magic monster. live great adventures, breeding feeding and training fantastic magic monsters, Use your magician or witch powers to find these magical friends.

Features:

  •  Feed and train your pets to increase their magical power.
  •  Improve your food and training to make them more effective.
  • Compete in the leagues and show your power.
  • Discover all the events that occur in this much magical.
  •  Collect all the magic monsters and their evolutions more than 30 different.
  • Face other real players in sync competitions
  • Win the medals of each gym and collect them all.
  • Defend your gym and become the leader so that nobody can have your medal.

Collections:

  • Magic monsters
  • Events
  • Medals
  • Leagues

To play online download the android or ios version
